stories.title: The caveats of Julia for image processing (ii) – the image structure

stories.text:
I have a customer that wants to secure the server room.

They would like a lock that has a built-in non-resetable mechanical counter. Every time the lock is unlocked the counter should increment. They want each person to record the number when entering the room.

So far I have been unable to find such a thing, although it seems like a very useful device.

Does such a thing exist?
stories.title: Customer wants lock with non-resetable mechanical counter

stories.text:
I am checking something and even though this link works fine: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29485561

When queried through firebase API it returns null: https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/item/29485561.json

Does anyone know why?
stories.title: Why Hacker News API does not work for some items?
